summary: An animated adaptation of "The Wind in the Willows" followed by an adaptation of "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow".
cast: Bing Crosby|Basil Rathbone|Eric Blore|J. Pat O'Malley|John McLeish|Colin Campbell|Campbell Grant|Claud Allister|Jud Conlon's Rhythmaires|Pinto Colvig|Jud Conlon|Leslie Denison|Mack McLean|Clarence Nash|Loulie Jean Norman|Charlie Parlota|Edmond Stevens|Oliver Wallace|Gloria Wood
director: Directors: James Algar, Clyde Geronimi | 1 more credit »
title: La leyenda de Sleepy Hollow y el Señor Sapo
